idea: Kstars Consulting & Professional Services Group provides expert support for all of the solutions we offer including design, implementation and managed services, we do take turn key projects and consulting work.
name: KSTARS TECHNOLOGY LLP

idea: DOT's paramount concentration is Home Automation. Coming up with the first product Direct Automated Shelf Helper (DASH). An IoT based real-time grocery monitoring appliance that would keep you updated with grocery stock in your kitchen like pulses, rice, lentils, and much more and keep you notified on your registered device when a particular commodity is going to finish . It also connects you to the nearest retailers and makes a checklist, which can be customized according to your needs. With our first product, we establish proximity with retailers and consuming users.
name: DOT

idea:
Founded in 2019 by Vimal Suchak, AboveSkill has come a long with from its inception in Mumbai, India. When Vimal first started out, his passion was strongly focused on bringing about solution for students and individuals through innovative workshops based on 21st Century Skill sets.

AboveSkill is a unique, one of its kind workshop platform, enabling and enhancing learners with essential life skills. The results are a happy learning community, ready to break the challenges of life and soar to great heights.

We hope you enjoy our workshops as much as we enjoy conceptualising them to you. If you have any questions or comments, please do not hesitate to contact us.
name: AboveSkill

idea:
We are a reputed International Freight Forwarding and Customs Clearance company having strong presence in these fields. As well as we in field of organising Events and promotion having experience of 11 years.

We organise events i.e Global level Events & promotions, Film Promotional Events, Celebrity management, All types of corporate Summits, Brand Launching, Weddings, Parties & other Functions and so on.

We have an exclusive network of global operators, who have considerable knowledge and experience in this business, empowering us to deliver your cargo to distant places safe and securely. We provide a comprehensive range of value added distribution services for Exports and Import Shipments, Air/Ocean, Less than Container Leads (LCL) or Full Container Loads (FCL) & Break Bulk. We offer flexible services and assistance. We have arrangements to have the consignments picked up from, and delivered at your doorstep.

Import / Export Supporting Services

• Exim Policy, Exports-Import Policy, Licenses, Incentives Logistics, Exim Finance, Exim legal matters etc.

• DGFT, RBI and Ministries for all Import-Export Licenses, and all other Exim related requirement’s.

• Application and issuance of DEEC, DFRC, Advance License, EPCG, Duty Drawback, Deemed Export Benefits etc.

We offer services like Airport to Airport, Sea Port to Port, Ex.-Works, Door Delivery, Customs Clearance, Handling Commodities of basically all nature viz Coils, Garments, Machinery, Spare Parts, Automobile parts, Pharmaceuticals & Garments & Accessories, etc. An exclusive service of Exports & Imports as per shippers’/consignees’ requirements helps us grow ourselves as a leading Freight Forwarding Organization.
name: KREATORSS VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED
